title: Liverpool legend Dietmar Hamann slams boss Jurgen Klopp over tactics and transfer deals
text:
KLOPP HAMM-ERED Liverpool legend Dietmar Hamann slams boss Jurgen Klopp over tactics and transfer deals 
Fellow-German can't fathom why Liverpool 'committed themselves so soon to such a long term dependence on Klopp' by STEVE GOODMAN Comments JURGEN KLOPP has come in for a blistering attack from Liverpool great Dietmar Hamann. 
The Kop boss saw his side go out of their second cup competition in a week when Championship strugglers Wolves handed them a 2-1 FA Cup defeat on Saturday . PA:Press Association Jurgen Klopp is totally to blame for Liverpool’s cup demise, says Dietmar Hamann 
The Reds have won just once in eight games this year. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Liverpool news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary Now as they prepare for Tuesday’s crucial showdown with Chelsea , Klopp’s fellow German Hamann has savaged his tactics and transfer policy. And the 43-year-old, who ended a seven-year Anfield spell in 2006, questioned Liverpool’s wisdom in awarding Klopp a contract until 2022. EMPICS Sport Hamann wonders why Klopp was handed a contract until 2022 Hamann declared: “Klopp, of course, has to take the blame for Liverpool’s FA Cup exit. “I don’t understand why he rotated his squad so much. OK, they play fairly often, but they are not in Europe this season. “They lost two cup finals last season under Klopp because they lack the mindset necessary to play in finals. But Liverpool don’t act this way in the transfer market – the do things the other way round. “I can’t understand why Liverpool committed themselves so soon to such a long term dependence on Klopp. Getty Images Sadio Mane…the only thing Liverpool have approaching a quick winger Liverpool 1-2 Wolves : Paul Lambert’s side provide first FA Cup fourth round upset Reuters 4 James Milner is not a long-term solution "You can only do that if you've finished a good second in the table, or if you have won the FA Cup. "If you play 4-3-3 you need quick wingers, but Liverpool just have Sadio Mane in their normal line-up. 
" Philippe Coutinho would be an option for central midfield, but their greatest problem is the No.6 position. They need a proper strategist. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport’s daily LIVE blog . "James Milner can't be a long-term solution . They always play with five in midfield, but that does not work in the Premier League." Hamann also played for Newcastle, Manchester City and MK Dons after beginning his career at Bayern Munich. The midfielder was capped 59 times.
